sentences: Ta rääkis niimoodi, et me kõik arvasime, et ta on õpetaja.
Ta tegutses niimoodi, justkui poleks midagi juhtunud.
context: The word 'niimoodi' is used to describe the manner or way something is done, similar to the English phrase 'in this way'. It can be used in various contexts to indicate how an action was performed or how someone behaved.
